roleset.name: make sparkly by decorating with tinsel
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 9.9. Comparison to ‘ornament’. Roleset by Julia.

example.name: All args, metaphorical
example.text: Jazz buff Eastwood also tinseled the soundtrack with versions of some of Mercer's best-known songs.
example.arg: with versions of some of Mercer's best-known songs.

example.name: theme as subject
example.text: Mountain goat hair tinseled the low bushes all around.
